resources.string: YES -- I take coffee too. \n Want us to transform community together? Lets meet :)

Am charismatic and passionate about communities and development. 

Have initiated a couple of community based organizations here in Coast and work with all of them as a Patron. 

Currently, I consult at Seacom Cable Station as I pay close attention to Swahilipot Hub, a centre established to nurture youths as they transform communities through creative innovations.
A telecom engineer with passion for communities
Am married, right-handed, don\'t have cats (not saying I hate em) and love listening to old rocks
I practise photography and mentor young soccer players
\"The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.\" \n- Mahatma Gandhi
I Underwent my Electronics and Radio transmission at KCCT (now MMU) and trained on Radio and Broadband at United States Telecommunications Institute in the USA.
I have worked for 11 years as a Radio and Transmission expert at Telkom Kenya.I was among the team that implemented the GOK connectivity that linked all ministries.
I worked under TKL Data services and was involved in design, installation, commissioning and maintainance of Data/ Internet network allover Kenya.
Founded TUMALEO.COM , one of the first online Instant Money Transfer in 1999 and later co-founded Afripayment LLC that started POSTAPAY.
I joined Seacom as Station Manager and rose to the rank of Regional Operations Manager in North and East Africa . Currently, I\'m a consultant at Seacom Cable Station.
